title: Spíonáin is Róiseanna
description: Tá an saol samhlaíochta atá cruthaithe ag Nuala Ní Dhomhnaill ina cuid filíochta, saol scóipiúil, rábach, ar cheann de phríomhbhuanna nualitríocht na Gaeilge, rud atá le sonrú sa chnuasach seo.Nuala Ní Dhomhnaill is one of Ireland’s leading poets. Poetically she is a traditionalist yet revolutionary in her own way. The world of her poetic imagination is clearly on display in this collection.
author: nuala-ni-dhomhnaill
